title: Vietnam, Australia's war
creator_credit: Michael Phillips, Joseph Matthews and Number One
brief_description: Examines Australia’s involvement in the Vietnam Conflict, 1962-72 using archival footage, stills, maps, home movies and newspaper headlines. Presents a chronological sequence of events during this period and queries Australia’s involvement. Addresses the long-term health and emotional effects of the conflict on veterans and their families.
